Articles.Content:
Hi guys! I am going to be recording my first ever circumvigation in KSP! Jeb and Bill decided that they were bored of sitting around at the KSC, so they hopped in a new rover, grabbed a teleporter labled "Hyperedit" and went to the Mun!

Mods used:

KER

USI LS modified slightly (I've changed the  stock converter to also let me make fertilizer, since I don't plan on using mks but I don't want to constantly be launching new resupply missions all the time since I am horrible at precision landings).

Hyper edit. I will only use this mod once for the entire trip. My original plan was to use the Hanger mod and launch the rover inside of a ground hanger, but it was too large . This mod's only purpose was to put the rover on the mun for me.

KIS/KAS

Dang it to make it more suspenseful/exciting then just staring at a screen waiting to hit a crater .

KPBS to help make an inline drill to collect ore for food and the emergency fuel converter.

 

Album link below!

https://imgur.com/a/sBESD

Thanks for reading and hope you enjoy!

Edited October 21, 2017 by nascarlaser1
I drove 100 kilometers on the Mun and 100 kilometers on Duna with a rover a lot like  yours. One of the best things I've ever done in KSP. Nice job!

21 minutes ago, Confused Scientist said:

I drove 100 kilometers on the Mun and 100 kilometers on Duna with a rover a lot like  yours. One of the best things I've ever done in KSP. Nice job!

Thanks!
Good luck!  Mun is definitely not my favorite place to drive any distance due to all the craters.  I salute you for taking up that challenge.
New chapter coming later this week . In the next chapter we watch my first accident unfold. Thankfully its not mission ending, just mission delaying .

As promised here is chapter 2!

https://imgur.com/a/lGYKS

Thanks for reading!

Edited October 27, 2017 by nascarlaser1
